[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [HTMLView](../fast-element.htmlview/index.html)

## HTMLView class

The standard View implementation, which also implements ElementView and SyntheticView.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class HTMLView<TSource = any, TParent = any> extends DefaultExecutionContext<TParent> implements ElementView<TSource, TParent>, SyntheticView<TSource, TParent>, ExecutionContext<TParent> 
```
**Extends:** DefaultExecutionContext&lt;TParent&gt;

**Implements:** [ElementView](../fast-element.elementview/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource, TParent&gt;, [SyntheticView](../fast-element.syntheticview/)<!-- -->&lt;TSource, TParent&gt;, [ExecutionContext](../fast-element.executioncontext/)<!-- -->&lt;TParent&gt;

</td><td>

Appends the view's DOM nodes to the referenced node.

[bind(source, context)](../fast-element.htmlview.bind/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Binds a view's behaviors to its binding source.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[dispose()](../fast-element.htmlview.dispose/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Removes the view and unbinds its behaviors, disposing of DOM nodes afterward. Once a view has been disposed, it cannot be inserted or bound again.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[disposeContiguousBatch(views)](../fast-element.htmlview.disposecontiguousbatch/)


</td><td>

`static`


</td><td>

Efficiently disposes of a contiguous range of synthetic view instances.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[insertBefore(node)](../fast-element.htmlview.insertbefore/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Inserts the view's DOM nodes before the referenced node.


</td></tr>

[onUnbind(behavior)](../fast-element.htmlview.onunbind/)


</td><td>


</td><td>


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[remove()](../fast-element.htmlview.remove/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Removes the view's DOM nodes. The nodes are not disposed and the view can later be re-inserted.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[unbind()](../fast-element.htmlview.unbind/)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Unbinds a view's behaviors from its binding source.


</td></tr>
